---
title: "Healthcare Variation and Physician Agency"
---

Module 2 covers geographic (both across and within) variation in healthcare utilization and expenditures. We'll discuss the causes of such variation, focusing first on demand vs. supply-side explanations. We'll then discuss the role of physician agency as one critical supply-side factor.
